attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please, prime minister, other countries are sending aid to Greece who is suffering her worst attack of arson in the history of the land.  The elderly in their small villages may be stranded and need supplies, food and water, and the fire services need help to tackle the fires.  Please make an announcement to state what aid Britain will allocate to help, as there are many Greeks who live here who will be affected by this tragedy.

Many thanks,
Greeks and friends of Greeks,
the United Kingdom

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
